item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Airline informant received thousands from passenger cash seizures (133 points | 30 comments)
2. Reverse engineering the Sega Channel game image file format (92 points | 15 comments)
3. Nyxt: The Hacker's Browser (38 points | 11 comments)
4. Just: Just a Command Runner (397 points | 240 comments)
5. The largest open-source dataset of car designs, including their aerodynamics (206 points | 76 comments)
6. "BGP at home": getting a DIA circuit installed at home (59 points | 3 comments)
7. PostgreSQL High Availability Solutions – Part 1: Jepsen Test and Patroni (41 points | 6 comments)
8. Composite and hard reset mods for the Tandyvision One (10 points | discuss)
9. GrapheneOS on Pixels getting extended Android support (19 points | 3 comments)
10. My4th Light – Custom 8-Bit Forth CPU (25 points | 6 comments)
11. Brian Krebs Investigates Internet's Most Vicious Hackers–From a Secret Location (95 points | 6 comments)
12. Show HN: I built an HTML5 RTL-SDR application (49 points | 12 comments)
13. Show HN: Countless.dev – A website to compare every AI model: LLMs, TTSs, STTs (268 points | 65 comments)
14. What Arm's CEO makes of the Intel debacle (12 points | 1 comment)
15. Hiroshi Nagai: Japan's Sun-Drenched Americana (235 points | 38 comments)
16. Notre Dame Cathedral reopens (120 points | 54 comments)
17. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
18. Unique killer whale pod may have acquired special skills to hunt whale sharks (15 points | 7 comments)
19. Hacker.txt (1993) (11 points | discuss)
20. My second year without a job (518 points | 783 comments)
21. AI Agents as Neuro-Symbolic Systems? [video] (3 points | discuss)
22. Historically, 4NF explanations are needlessly confusing (71 points | 18 comments)
23. Browsing negative content online makes mental health struggles worse: Study (120 points | 68 comments)
24. Beekeepers halt honey awards over fraud in global supply chain (187 points | 189 comments)
25. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (314 points | 69 comments)
26. Deepfakes weaponised to target Pakistan's women leaders (56 points | 18 comments)
27. Show HN: AirFry.Pro – The best popular and healthy recipes for your air fryer (12 points | 4 comments)
28. Biggest shell programs (211 points | 105 comments)
29. The Booze of Monkey Island is an unofficial fan game (28 points | 1 comment)
30. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (294 points | 102 comments)
